Package flounder.sounds

Contains classes for loading, managing and playing a variety of different sound types.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAudioListener
    An audio listener in the 3D world.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmbientNode
    Basically a 3D sphere of sound that can be added to the world to provide ambient sound effects to a certain area.
    AudioController
    An object which allows other classes to alter the settings of a sound source while playing a certain sound.
    MusicPlayer
    The class in charge of playing background music!
    Playlist
    A playlist of music tracks that can be played on the MusicPlayer.
    PlayRequest
    A request that can be sent to the DeviceSound specifying what sound should be played and what settings the source playing it should use.
    Sound
    Represents a single sound effect.
    SoundEffect
    Represents a 3D sound effect which can be played in the 3D world.
    SoundEmitter
    An emitter of sound effects in the 3D world.
    SoundLoader
    Contains methods used for loading and deleting sounds, and also keeps track of all the sound buffers that are currently loaded so that it can delete them when the game closes.
    SoundSource
    Sound sources are what play the sounds in OpenAL.
    SourcePoolManager
    The source pool manager keeps track of all the current sound sources and deals with any requests to play a sound.
    Streamer
    A streamer object is used to carry out the streaming of one playing of a large audio file.
    StreamManager
    This thread runs in the background and keeps any audio streams updated.
    WavDataStream
    Class that enables streaming wav data.

Package flounder.sounds Description

Contains classes for loading, managing and playing a variety of different sound types.
